results.title: Sinonasal undifferentiated carcinoma (SNUC): morphoproteomic-guided treatment paradigm with clinical efficacy.
results.text_hl: This report discusses two @<m>DISEASE_Sinonasal_undifferentiated_carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537344 @@@SNUC@@@ cases where @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received a novel chemotherapeutic approach using @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Etoposide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005047 @@@etoposide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@Adriamycin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and adjuvant @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ therapies based on morphoproteomic-guidance, followed by consolidation with chemoradiation therapy.

citations.NLM: Ansari M, Guo S, Fakhri S, Citardi MJ, Blanco A, Patino M, Buryanek J, Amato R, Karni R, Brown RE. Sinonasal undifferentiated carcinoma (SNUC): morphoproteomic-guided treatment paradigm with clinical efficacy. Ann Clin Lab Sci. 2013 Winter;43(1):45-53. PMID: 23462605
